outcome: Nitrogen (N, including ammonium [NH4+] and nitrate [NO3-] in soils)
Plant condition (weeds and invasive species), n.e.c.
Plant damage, infection, and infestation (weeds and invasive species)
Plant diversity (e.g., species richness, alpha diversity, etc.)
Plant fecundity (e.g., seed banks and germination rates)
Plant fecundity (weeds and invasive species) (e.g., seed banks and germination rates)
Plant occurrence (weeds and invasive species) (e.g., presence/absence)
Plant size and growth rate (weeds and invasive species)
Soil micronutrients and secondary nutrients (e.g., calcium [Ca] and magnesium [Mg])
Soil mineralization (decomposition from organic to inorganic forms)
Soil organic matter (SOM) and soil carbon (C)
Soil texture (i.e. sand, silt, and clay content)
Abundance of invertebrates as natural enemies of crop pests
hlo: Abundance of invertebrate enemies of crop pests

outcome: Crop appearance (including the size and shape of the edible parts)
Crop biomass (including inedible components; e.g., the stems of some crops)
Crop damage or infection by pathogens (e.g., disease severity)
outcome_short: Crop damage or infection by pathogens
hlo: Crop damage or infection by pathogens

outcome: Crop damage or infestation by pests
outcome_short: Crop damage or infestation by pests
hlo: Crop damage or infestation by pests

outcome: Crop propagules (including cuttings and seeds not used for food, feed, fuel, etc.)
Dry matter content (i.e. proportion or percentage; also see "Crop yield" for dry matter yield)
Invertebrate pest abundance (not measured in the crop; see "Crop damage" for infestation rate)
Micronutrients and other elements (e.g., calcium [Ca] and magnesium [Mg])
Nitrogen (N) in plants (including biological nitrogen fixation)
Plant growth rate (e.g., photosynthetic rate or radiation use efficiency [RUE])
Plant size (e.g., canopy cover, ground cover, leaf area index [LAI], or height)
Soil erosion (including soil loss through harvesting)
Crop damage, infection, and infestation (also see pathogens, pests, and weeds)
